column5: Hello: Other than a passport and drivers license what else do I need ? Can a fishing license be bought on line ? What is an outdoors card ? Can it be bought on line ? Thank You . Good Luck O R

http://www.mnr.gov.on.ca/en/Business...02_165323.htmlYou can buy the outdoors card by mail, but not the license. The license can be bought once you're in Canada.. we always get ours at the resort. Neither can be purchased online.
I ordered both over the phone, took about 5 min. In April, it took about a week to get both in the mail, about 3 weeks later my official card in the mail. All ready to go now!

You can order both over the phone takes about 5 min however the time frame for you getting them might be longer so watch your time for your fishing trip you do not want to be waiting for it when you leave for canada. If it is within 3 weeks i would wait and purchase them in canada. Stop the first place you see fishing licenses for sale. Two years ago we had to stop 4 places to get 8 guys both outdoor cards and fishing licenses. Some of the places sold out of one or the other.
Talk with your lodge and see if they offer them, that would be the least hassle. Your passport and drivers license along with a clean record should get you across the border
